constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Texas:
H.R. 167.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Commerce Clause (Art. 1, Sec. 8, Cl. 3)
Necessary and Proper Clause (Art. l, Sec. 8, Cl. 18)
[Page H55]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: To prohibit the transfer of a firearm at a gun show by a person who is not a federally licensed firearms dealer.
